testCase.name: App.vue - should render router view
App.vue - should show AIAssistant when authenticated
App.vue - should have auth store available

AIAssistant.vue - should create new conversation
AIAssistant.vue - should load chat list

RequirementTreeView.vue - should accept requirements prop
RequirementTreeView.vue - should handle empty requirements
PriorityBadge.vue - should render priority badge
PriorityBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for CRITICAL priority
PriorityBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for HIGH priority
PriorityBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for MEDIUM priority
RequirementCard.vue - should render requirement card
RequirementCard.vue - should display requirement ID
RequirementForm.vue - should render requirement form
RequirementForm.vue - should accept props
RequirementForm.vue - should handle basic rendering
RequirementHistory.vue - should render requirement history
RequirementHistory.vue - should display history items
RequirementHistory.vue - should show empty state when no history
RequirementModal.vue - should render modal
RequirementModal.vue - should emit close event
StatusBadge.vue - should render status badge
StatusBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for APPROVED status
StatusBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for REVIEW status
StatusBadge.vue - should apply correct classes for DEPRECATED status
useRequirementStyles - getStatusClasses - should return approved classes for APPROVED status
useRequirementStyles - getStatusClasses - should return review classes for REVIEW status
useRequirementStyles - getStatusClasses - should return deprecated classes for DEPRECATED status
useRequirementStyles - getStatusClasses - should return default classes for unknown status
useRequirementStyles - getStatusClasses - should include base classes for all statuses
useRequirementStyles - getPriorityClasses - should return critical classes for CRITICAL priority
useRequirementStyles - getPriorityClasses - should return high classes for HIGH priority
useRequirementStyles - getPriorityClasses - should return medium classes for MEDIUM priority
useRequirementStyles - getPriorityClasses - should return default classes for unknown priority
useRequirementStyles - getPriorityClasses - should include base classes for all priorities
AIService - sendMessage - should send message successfully
AIService - sendMessage - should throw error on failed request

AIService - createNewConversation - should throw error on failed request
AIService - getChatList - should get chat list successfully
AIService - getChatList - should throw error on failed request
AIService - deleteConversation - should delete conversation successfully
AIService - deleteConversation - should throw error on failed request
authService - login - should login successfully

useAuthStore - should initialize with null user and token from localStorage
useAuthStore - should compute isAuthenticated correctly
useAuthStore - should compute isAdmin correctly
useAuthStore - should compute isEditor correctly
useAuthStore - login - should login successfully
useAuthStore - login - should handle login error
useAuthStore - fetchCurrentUser - should fetch current user when token exists
useAuthStore - fetchCurrentUser - should not fetch user when no token
useAuthStore - fetchCurrentUser - should logout on fetch error
useAuthStore - validateToken - should validate token and set user
useAuthStore - validateToken - should logout on validation error
useAuthStore - validateToken - should not validate when no token
useAuthStore - logout - should clear user and token

useProjectStore - updateProject - should handle update error
useProjectStore - deleteProject - should delete project successfully
useProjectStore - deleteProject - should clear currentProject if it matches deleted project
useProjectStore - deleteProject - should handle delete error
requirementSorting - extractNumber - should extract number after last dash
requirementSorting - extractNumber - should return 0 when no number found
requirementSorting - extractNumber - should handle empty string
requirementSorting - compareReqIds - should sort by number when prefixes are same
requirementSorting - compareReqIds - should return 0 for identical IDs
requirementSorting - compareReqIds - should sort by string when numbers are equal
requirementSorting - compareReqIds - should handle mixed formats gracefully
requirementSorting - compareReqIds - should sort naturally by number
